amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt settlement agreements that strengthen the personal privacy of Americans from the blanket prohibition.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 114-724 to exempt settlement agreements that strengthen the personal privacy of Americans from the blanket prohibition in this legislation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cicilline amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 236 (Roll no. 484).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Cicilline amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 236 (Roll no. 484).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Cicilline.
